entry.title: $2600 // Luxurious apartment features top notch custom design and style.
entry.content:
Ref#22423

Don't miss out on this unique & curated life style experience! From the renovations down to even the smallest art pieces, this luxurious apartment features top notch custom design and style. Start & finish from the perspective of living in a magazine. "Google Home" comes in every unit. The beautiful designs carry throughout the property to shared common spaces in-door and out. Top notch surveillance & entry for your peace of mind. Join our thriving residential community today
